description: Provides a resource to create a SES template.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Html.description: The HTML body of the email. Must be less than 500KB in size, including both the text and HTML parts.

Name.description: The name of the template. Cannot exceed 64 characters. You will refer to this name when you send email.

Subject.description: The subject line of the email.

Text.description: The email body that will be visible to recipients whose email clients do not display HTML. Must be less than 500KB in size, including both the text and HTML parts.
